resources.string: LetÂ´s play a little game inmate. \n If you win you get to live another day. \n If you loose. well you loose..

I started programming very late in my life. 33 years old. But i quickly realized. this is what i want to do with my life. I have always had a passion for gaming, software, electronics and everything IT related. I spend the first 13 years of my working career as a mason. A decade later i finally realized that i software engineering was what i wanted to do.
